attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is the worst thought tax change that effects to many already low paid
struggling too cope with all the rises in basic utilities and can only allienate labour voters who now have a choice to throw you biggotts out...WE CANT CLAIM OUR TV LICENCE OUT OF TAX PAYERS MONEY......

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
